# Byte-code files
*.pyc
__pycache__/

# Virtual environment
venv/
env/

# Distribution / packaging
.Python
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
.eggs/

# C extensions
*.so
*.dll
*.dylib

# IDEs and editors
.idea/
.vscode/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Example of user-specific configuration files that might contain secrets
# local_settings.py
